data: This is the first life log. I'll keep the design as minimal as possible for now due to time constraints. You’ll understand why in the next log very soon.

I've started preparing for the think-cell C++ developer interview. The application process looks very tough: it begins with a challenging online assessment, followed by two interviews. Although the job description says it's open to fresh graduates, the reviews suggest they're really aiming for experts. Preparingâ€¦
